title: Authenticated -> Concurrency -> Verify if the network disrupted then the other device should play the asset.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User has downloaded tvOS App (QA, PROD)
AND user is logged in with an authenticated account
AND there are 4 or more devices logged in using the same account ( 6 or more for PROD builds)
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to Scoreboard view
AND launches a live stream on the 5th device (QA) or 7th device (PROD)
AND receives Concurrency error.
AND the user disconnects network connectivity on one of the devices that are displaying the stream
custom_expected:
THEN the device that previously displayed the Concurrency error will no longer receive an error when the user restarts the stream
AND the stream will play successfully.

title: Authenticated -> Concurrency -> Verify whether the Concurrency error message displays -> Happy path
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User has downloaded tvOS App (QA, PROD)
AND user is logged in with an authenticated account
AND there are 4 or more devices logged in using the same account ( 6 or more for PROD builds)
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to Scoreboard view
AND launches a live stream on the 5th device (QA) or 7th device (PROD)
custom_expected:
WHEN the user plays the asset in all the 5 devices then in 4 devices the user should able to stream the asset with no issues. 
But for the 5th device the user should see the concurrency error message. *

* 
PROD -->( WHEN the user plays the asset in all the 7 devices then in 6 devices the user should able to stream the asset with no issues. 
But for the 6th device the user should see the concurrency error message.) <-- PROD

title: Authenticated -> Concurrency -> Verify whether the Concurrency error message displays after relaunching the App
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User has downloaded tvOS App (QA, PROD)
AND user is logged in with an authenticated account
AND there are 4 or more devices logged in using the same account ( 6 or more for PROD builds)
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to Scoreboard view
AND launches a live stream on the 5th device (QA) or 7th device (PROD)
AND receives Concurrency error.
AND the user exits the stream
AND the user re-launches the stream
custom_expected: WHEN the user Re-launches stream on 5th (7th for PROD) device, then user should see the concurrency error message again.

title: Authenticated -> Concurrency -> Verify whether the Concurrency error message displays for additional devices
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User has downloaded tvOS App (QA, PROD)
AND user is logged in with an authenticated account
AND there are 4 or more devices logged in using the same account ( 6 or more for PROD builds)
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to Scoreboard view
AND launches a live stream on the 5th device (QA) or 7th device (PROD)
AND receives Concurrency error.
AND the User attempts to launch the stream on any number of additional devices
custom_expected: THEN the user should see the concurrency error message.
